resources.string: To add all the files in the current directory, use git add . To add a directory use git add <directory>

string-array.name: cherry_pick_subcommands
string-array.item: an commit from origin branch into my working branch

string-array.name: clone_subcommands
string-array.item: existing repo into a new directory
existing repo into a current directory
existing repo along with submodules into the current directory

string-array.name: commit_subcommands
string-array.item: commit all local changes in tracked files
commit all local changes in tracked files

string-array.name: compare_two_commits_subcommands
string-array.item: and output result in the terminal
and output result to a file

string-array.name: del_subcommands
string-array.item: local branches that does not exist at remote

string-array.name: ignore_subcommands
string-array.item: all files of a specific type

string-array.name: merge_subcommands
string-array.item: merge a single file from one branch to another

string-array.name: modify_subcommands
string-array.item: my last or latest commit message
my last commit but leave the commit message

string-array.name: rebase_subcommands
string-array.item: an origin branch into my working branch
a local branch into my working branch
